FuncDef:
The diameter predefined-rule support-type edsg command configures a Diameter Gx interface to support EDSG service delivery by a Diameter server.
The undo diameter predefined-rule support-type edsg command restores the default configuration.
By default, a Diameter Gx interface does not support EDSG service delivery by a Diameter server.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a Diameter Gx interface to support EDSG service delivery by a Diameter server, run the diameter predefined-rule support-type edsg command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
